DOC.brief_summary: The intention study determine wether coffee add milk change gastric volume comparison gastric volume drink black coffee
DOC.brief_title: Does Adding Milk Coffee Change Gastric Volume ?
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty participant - divide tree group - drink coffee without milk six hour fast solid food . Each group drink coffee without milk different order . Two hour drink coffee gastric volume measure Magnetic Resonance Imagining .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Former present gastric history , pregnancy , claustrophobia , metal implant
